name: Naruto Shippuden Uncut: Kakashi: Shadow of the ANBU Black Ops - Their Own Paths
short_description: Yukimi leaves the village to see the outside world, taking ?Tenzo? with her. Kakashi tries to convince the two to return so that he can set a trap to capture Orochimaru, who is after Yukimi's blood. But Yamato, who has grown attached to Yukimi, abandons his original mission to protect his friend.
